changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE ruleform.status_code_attribute ( id bigserial NOT NULL, status_code bigint NOT NULL, attribute bigint NOT NULL, numeric_value numeric, integer_value integer, boolean_value boolean, text_value character varying, timestamp_value timestamp, -- If the Attribute has a timestamp value, it is stored in this column binary_value bytea, -- If the Attribute has a binary value, it is stored in this column unit bigint, sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, notes character varying, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone,
CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_status_code_fkey FOREIGN KEY (status_code) REFERENCES ruleform.status_code (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_unit_fkey FOREIGN KEY (unit) REFERENCES ruleform.unit (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_status_code_key UNIQUE (status_code , attribute ), CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_sequence_number_check CHECK (sequence_number > 0), CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_valid_value CHECK ((ruleform.null_zero(numeric_value) + ruleform.null_zero(integer_value) + ruleform.null_zero(boolean_value) + ruleform.null_zero(text_value) + ruleform.null_zero(timestamp_value) + ruleform.null_zero(binary_value)) = 1) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );

changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE ruleform.status_code_attribute OWNER TO core;

changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE INDEX status_code_attribute_updated_by_fkey_idx ON ruleform.status_code_attribute USING btree (updated_by );
